quote: Don't be pushed by your problems; be led by your dreams. – Unknown
fact: The citrus soda 7-UP was created in 1929; `7` was selected after the original 7-ounce containers and `UP` for the direction of the bubbles.
joke: To the person who stole my anti-depressant pills: I hope you're happy now.
